thread.title: Europe Plants a Flag in the Digital-Tax Debate

author: Simon Nixon
title: Europe Plants a Flag in the Digital-Tax Debate
text:
The European Union could hardly have chosen a more provocative moment to launch proposals for a new digital tax.
The EUâ€™s trade commissioner is currently in Washington trying to persuade the Trump administration to exempt the bloc from new U.S. tariffs on imported steel and aluminum, amid fears of a trade war. The U.S. and EU are at loggerheads over a range of other issues ranging from climate change to Iran to defense spending.
